subject: Football
Sports Injuries
X-Rays
Concussions
Instant Replay (Sports)
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. sidelines have become increasingly high-tech, with video, digital X-ray results and tablet-assisted concussion exams to help diagnose injuries.
